story.iWant: a well-organized project structure with proper configuration files
story.soThat: the codebase is maintainable and follows best practices

tasks.task: Initialize Frontend Project Structure - Create `frontend/` directory - Initialize React app with Vite: `npm create vite@latest frontend -- --template react-ts` - Install Tailwind CSS 3.3+ and configure `tailwind.config.js` - Install React Router 6+ and Zustand 4.4+ - Install Axios 1.6+ for API client - Configure TypeScript with strict mode in `tsconfig.json` - Set up ESLint and Prettier configurations - Create basic folder structure: `src/routes/`, `src/components/`, `src/lib/`, `src/store/` - Create `.env.example` with `VITE_API_URL` placeholder - Testing: Verify frontend builds successfully with `npm run build`

Initialize Backend Project Structure - Create `backend/` directory - Set up Python 3.11+ virtual environment - Create `requirements.txt` with FastAPI 0.104+, Uvicorn, SQLAlchemy 2.0+, Pydantic, python-dotenv - Create basic FastAPI project structure: `app/main.py`, `app/core/`, `app/api/`, `app/db/`, `app/schemas/` - Create `.env.example` with database URL and API key placeholders - Create `backend/app/core/config.py` for environment variable management - Testing: Verify backend imports and can start with `uvicorn app.main:app --reload`
Create Deployment Directory Structure - Create `deployment/` directory - Create placeholder files: `deploy.sh`, `nginx.conf`, `fastapi.service` - Add deployment documentation comments in files

Verify Project Structure Matches Architecture - Compare actual structure with `docs/architecture.md#Project-Structure` - Verify frontend structure matches: `frontend/src/routes/`, `frontend/src/components/`, `frontend/src/lib/`, `frontend/src/store/` - Verify backend structure matches: `backend/app/api/routes/`, `backend/app/core/`, `backend/app/db/`, `backend/app/schemas/` - Testing: Run directory structure validation script or manual verification

ac.when: I clone and examine the project structure
ac.then: I see frontend directory with React + TypeScript + Vite, backend directory with Python + FastAPI, and proper configuration files

the project includes: - `package.json` with React 18+, TypeScript 5+, Vite 5+, Tailwind CSS 3.3+ - `requirements.txt` with Python 3.11+, FastAPI 0.104+, SQLAlchemy 2.0+ - TypeScript configuration with strict mode enabled - ESLint and Prettier configuration for code quality - Basic folder structure for components, services, utilities

doc.section: Story 1.1: Project Setup and Repository Structure

docs.doc: Story requirements and acceptance criteria for project setup. Specifies frontend (React + TypeScript + Vite) and backend (Python + FastAPI) structure with configuration files.

Technical specification with detailed acceptance criteria for project structure, frontend configuration (React 18+, TypeScript 5+, Vite 5+, Tailwind CSS 3.3+), and backend configuration (Python 3.11+, FastAPI 0.104+, SQLAlchemy 2.0+).

Target project structure layout with greenfield target showing frontend and backend directory organization. Specifies frontend structure: `frontend/src/routes/`, `frontend/src/components/`, `frontend/src/lib/`, `frontend/src/store/`. Backend structure: `backend/app/api/routes/`, `backend/app/core/`, `backend/app/db/`, `backend/app/schemas/`.
Naming conventions: React components use `PascalCase` filenames, React hooks/stores use `camelCase`, API routes use `/api/*` prefix, database tables use `snake_case`.
Frontend initialization guidance: `npm create vite@latest frontend -- --template react-ts`, install Tailwind, React Router, and Zustand.
Backend initialization guidance: Create `backend` directory with FastAPI app structure, use `.env` file and central config module for environment variables.
Technology stack specification: Frontend (React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS), Backend (Python 3.11 + FastAPI + SQLAlchemy).

constraint.rule: Follow the greenfield target layout specified in `docs/architecture.md#Project-Structure` with clear separation between `frontend/` and `backend/` directories
React 18 + TypeScript 5 + Vite 5 as specified in architecture document
Python 3.11 + FastAPI 0.104+ as specified in architecture document
Use `.env` files for environment variables, never commit sensitive data
React components: `PascalCase` filenames. React hooks/stores: `camelCase`. API routes: `/api/*` prefix. Database tables: `snake_case`.
TypeScript configuration must have strict mode enabled
ESLint and Prettier configurations required for code quality

tests.standards: Testing frameworks to be set up in this story: Frontend build verification (`npm run build`), Backend import verification (`uvicorn app.main:app --reload`). Full test coverage will be added in later epics when business logic is implemented. Testing standards from architecture: pytest for backend (setup in Epic 1, tests written in Epic 2+), Vitest or Jest for frontend (setup in Epic 1, tests written in Epic 2+).
tests.locations: - `backend/tests/` (to be created in future stories) - `frontend/src/__tests__/` or `frontend/tests/` (to be created in future stories)
